trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> object that is specified by the <see langword="Parameters" /> properties of the associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> 物件的元件編輯器，這個物件是由關聯的資料來源控制項的 <see langword="Parameters" /> 屬性所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor> class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> object at design time, as specified by one of the `Parameters` properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>類別會提供使用者介面編輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>在設計階段，其中所指定的物件`Parameters`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `Parameters` properties include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, and other data source controls.
trans-unit.target: `Parameters`屬性包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>，和其他資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor> is invoked by selecting the ellipsis (**…**) button on one of the `Parameters` properties in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>叫用時所選取省略符號 (**...**) 上的其中一個按鈕`Parameters`中的屬性**屬性**的視覺化設計工具的格線。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> method edits the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> for the associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A>方法編輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>相關聯的資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method gets the editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>方法取得與這個編輯器相關聯的編輯樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> attribute to associate the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor> and <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> (the collection editor base class) classes with a `SelectParameters` property in a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>屬性產生關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>和<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>（集合編輯器基底類別） 類別與`SelectParameters`自訂控制項中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor> class when the page designer selects the ellipsis (**…**) button on one of the `Parameters` properties in the visual designer's **Properties** grid while designing the associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 建構的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>類別時網頁設計工具選取省略符號 (**...**) 上的其中一個按鈕`Parameters`視覺化設計工具中的屬性**屬性**方格設計相關聯的資料來源控制項時。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object used to acquire context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，可用來取得內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> through which editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> 的物件，可用來取得編輯服務。

trans-unit.source: The object to edit the value for.
trans-unit.target: 要編輯其值的物件。

trans-unit.source: Edits the elements of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> objects of the associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: 編輯關聯資料來源控制項之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> 物件的項目。

trans-unit.source: The new <paramref name="value" />; otherwise, if the value of the object has not changed, <paramref name="value" /> unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <paramref name="value" />，否則，如果物件的值未變更，則 <paramref name="value" /> 不變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> method extracts the associated data source control and the data source control designer that is associated with that control from the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A>方法相關聯的資料來源控制項，並從該控制項相關聯的資料來源控制項設計工具還會擷取`context`參數。

trans-unit.source: The supported data source controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> controls, with their corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner> designers.
trans-unit.target: 支援的資料來源控制項包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項，及其對應<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner>設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Once the data is extracted, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> calls back to the data source control designer to display an editing dialog box that is used to edit a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> object that is referenced by one of the `Parameters` properties of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料時，一旦<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A>呼叫回資料來源控制項設計工具以顯示用來編輯編輯對話方塊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>其中一個所參考的物件`Parameters`原始檔控制中之資料的內容。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that indicates the context of the object being edited.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，表示要編輯之物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個編輯器相關聯的編輯樣式。

trans-unit.source: The editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: 與這個編輯器相關聯的編輯樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method always returns the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal> value, which indicates that the user interface for the editor is a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>方法一律會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal>值，指出編輯器 中的使用者介面為強制回應對話方塊。
